'''''Iron Viscount''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] Iron Viscount.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Iron Viscount can be found in a cave under [[Beryl Region]]. To unlock the cave entrance, complete the puzzle at hot spring above it and use the [[Phase Gate#Fontaine Phase Gate|Fontaine Phase Gate]].
